assertions: ✔ The user can open the form to add a new product threshold by clicking the "Tambah" button on the Ambang Batas Produk page.
✔ The minimum quantity field accepts the value "10" when entered by the user.
✔ The maximum quantity field accepts the value "100" when entered by the user.
✔ The user can select "General" as the category in the category dropdown.
✔ The user can select "Pria" as the sub-category after selecting the category.
✔ The user can select "Peci" as the product from the product dropdown.
✔ The user can submit the new product threshold by clicking the "Tambah" button in the add form.
✔ After submission, the add form closes and the list of product thresholds refreshes.
✔ The newly added product threshold with minimum 10, maximum 100, category "General", sub-category "Pria", and product "Peci" appears in the list.
summary: The user can successfully add a new product threshold by opening the form via the "Tambah" button, entering valid minimum and maximum quantities (10 and 100), and selecting the appropriate category ("General"), sub-category ("Pria"), and product ("Peci"). Upon submitting the form, it closes and the updated list displays the newly added threshold with the specified details.
error: User cancelled test due to system being stuck
